Package org.example.attendancelist.controller

Class ClassDateController

java.lang.Object
org.example.attendancelist.controller.ClassDateController
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="/api/classDates") public class ClassDateController extends Object
Controller class for managing class dates. Provides endpoints for creating and retrieving class dates.

      Parameters:

    • getClassDates

      @GetMapping("") public Iterable<ClassDate> getClassDates(@RequestParam(required=false) Integer id, @RequestParam(required=false) String date, @RequestParam(required=false) Integer groupId)
      Endpoint for retrieving class dates based on specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the class date to be retrieved.
      date - The date parameter for filtering class dates.
      groupId - The group ID parameter for filtering class dates.
      Returns:
      Iterable of ClassDate objects based on the specified parameters.

    • isDateValid

      public boolean isDateValid(LocalDateTime date)
      Checks if the given date is valid for class scheduling.
      Parameters:
      date - The LocalDateTime object representing the date.
      Returns:
      True if the date is valid; false otherwise.
